title: "Dysbindin-1 regulates mitochondrial fission and gamma oscillations"
excerpt: "Neuronal mitochondria are motile and undergo fission and fusion. Mitochondrial fission is mediated by the dynamin-related GTPase Drp1. During mitochondrial fission, cytosolic Drp1 is recruited to mitochondria,"
